name: Dwarven Seething
description: Your hatred drives every swing of your weapon.
prerequisites: Dwarven Hatred Style, base attack bonus +5, defensive training and hatred racial traits, Medium size.
benefit: While using Dwarven Hatred Style, when an opponent hits you with an attack (including a spell that requires an attack roll), you can apply your defensive training or your hatred racial trait bonus (your choice) against that target, regardless of the opponentâ€™s type or subtype, as an immediate action. This ability lasts until the opponent dies, the combat ends, you change styles, or you designate a different opponent with this ability, whichever occurs first.
